alert.note: Alert for Sumter (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 06 at 4:22PM EDT until April 06 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN SUMTER COUNTY... At 422 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Leslie, or 12 miles southeast of Americus, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Leslie, De Soto and Desoto. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for west central Georgia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
